TEXT.English: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the total commerce ([ICON_COMMERCE]) is shown before the individual commerce types ([ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE]).

TEXT.English: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the hover text for the Remove Specialist button includes the same specialist information shown on the Add Specialist button.

TEXT.English: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the list of buildings is shown using icons instead of their names.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City cannot draft another unit this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]City cannot draft another unit this turn[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows how many turns until a city will lose population if it is shrinking.

TEXT.English: When checked, the longitude and latitude are shown when hovering over a plot once you have centered the map.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the longitude and latitude are shown when hovering over a plot once you have centered the map.

TEXT.English: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, hides the instructions for selecting cities and showing base values to make room for the new information.

TEXT.English: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You have not signed an Open Borders agreement
TEXT.Chinese: [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET]You have not signed an Open Borders agreement

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry would be shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the technologies that will be sped up by acquiring the technology you are hovering over (e.g. Animal Husbandry would be shown for Agriculture once you have acquired Hunting).

TEXT.English: When checked, gives you the option to declare war when moving into a tile containing a rival unit. Always gives the option when moving into rival territory without open borders.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, gives you the option to declare war when moving into a tile containing a rival unit. Always gives the option when moving into rival territory without open borders.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to whipping and the number of turns left on the timer.

TEXT.English: When checked, the Zoom to City button includes detailed information about the city as when hovering over a city bar on the map.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the Zoom to City button includes detailed information about the city as when hovering over a city bar on the map.

TEXT.English: The Total Commerce from Domestic Trade Routes
TEXT.Chinese: The Total Commerce from Domestic Trade Routes

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city's borders expand due to culture ([ICON_CULTURE]).

TEXT.English: When checked, units ordered to heal will awaken when they spot danger, acting like sentries.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, units ordered to heal will awaken when they spot danger, acting like sentries.

TEXT.English: When checked, barbarian units adjacent to your borders will not trigger a warning if they cannot enter.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, barbarian units adjacent to your borders will not trigger a warning if they cannot enter.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the full details of the unit that will be drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the full details of the unit that will be drafted in the Draft button hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows base production (excludes overflow, whipping, and chopping) in addition to the current turn's production.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You have already chosen your free tech(s)[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You have already chosen your free tech(s)[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the experience point modifiers (buildings, military instructors, civics, and wonders) in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the experience point modifiers (buildings, military instructors, civics, and wonders) in the Train Unit button hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, places an airport icon above the city bars of cities that have an airport.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, places an airport icon above the city bars of cities that have an airport.

TEXT.English: When checked, the defensive pacts of each rival are shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the defensive pacts of each rival are shown in the hover text for their icon.

TEXT.English: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, includes the current turn's production when calculating overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and/or [ICON_GOLD]) from hurrying with the whip.

TEXT.English: The Total Commerce from Foreign Trade Routes
TEXT.Chinese: The Total Commerce from Foreign Trade Routes

TEXT.English: When checked and a city is constructing a building, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], and [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] it will produce are displayed.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked and a city is constructing a building, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], and [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] it will produce are displayed.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the net happiness ([ICON_HAPPY] or [ICON_UNHAPPY]) for the city.

TEXT.English: When checked, the worst enemy of each AI rival is shown in the hover text for their icon.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the worst enemy of each AI rival is shown in the hover text for their icon.

TEXT.English: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, Workers ordered to build an improvement that will remove a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the improvement.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_DEFENSE] of the city and from bombardment and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the actual yield of [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_HAPPY], [ICON_HEALTHY], [ICON_GREATPEOPLE], and [ICON_DEFENSE] the building will produce for the city are displayed in the building hover text.

TEXT.English: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the Whip Button hover includes the overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) created by applying the whip.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the experience points and number of available promotions a new unit will receive in the Train Unit button hover.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the experience points and number of available promotions a new unit will receive in the Train Unit button hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the whip overflow calculation includes the current [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate. Since applying the whip usually affects the rate, the actual overflow may be different.

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, hovering over a technology in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's TECHS page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_COMMERCE], [ICON_GOLD], [ICON_RESEARCH], [ICON_CULTURE], and [ICON_ESPIONAGE] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a plot that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, hovering over a plot that has partially-completed builds (improvements, routes, and chops) will show how many worker turns are required to complete them as long as your workers can actually do so.

TEXT.English: When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, if Sentry While Healing is enabled, units will awaken to danger only when in neutral territory. This stops your attacking force from waking up each turn outside an enemy city or your defenders inside friendly territory.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the cost ([ICON_CITIZEN] or [ICON_GOLD]) and overflow ([ICON_PRODUCTION] and [ICON_GOLD]) for hurrying (whip and/or buy) the item being produced.

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You can only draft %d1 [NUM1:unit:units] in cities with non-state religion this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You can only draft %d1 [NUM1:unit:units] in cities with non-state religion this turn[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_PRODUCTION] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, hovering over a resource in the "Won't Trade" column of the Foreign Advisor's RESOURCES page will show you the AI's reason for denying the trade.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the probability that the city will revolt due to cultural pressure.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the number of angry population ([ICON_ANGRYPOP]) due to drafting and the number of turns left on the timer.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_FOOD] rate and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HAPPY] and [ICON_UNHAPPY] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the net health ([ICON_HEALTHY] or [ICON_UNHEALTHY]) for the city.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows icons for the city's specialists (both citizens and settled great people).

TEXT.English: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You cannot draft any more units this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]You cannot draft any more units this turn[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This feature requires a newer version of the BUG DLL (BULL).[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]This feature requires a newer version of the BUG DLL (BULL).[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Will lose %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] if not produced this turn[COLOR_REVERT]
TEXT.Chinese: [COLOR_WARNING_TEXT]Will lose %d1[ICON_PRODUCTION] if not produced this turn[COLOR_REVERT]

TEXT.English: [SPACE](<ALT> for All Units of the active unit's type)
TEXT.Chinese: [SPACE](<ALT> for All Units of the active unit's type)

TEXT.English: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, the subtotal (total before modifiers) is shown when necessary for each commerce type in its hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the individual [ICON_GREATPEOPLE] rate per turn for each type in the hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows more detailed information about growth (growing, shrinking, starvation, stagnation).

TEXT.English: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, holding CTRL while hovering shows the base (without modifiers) values for most items: production, trade, commerce, maintenance, great people.

TEXT.English: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, if a unit's name contains its type (e.g. "Swordsman 5 of London"), it is replaced by the new type when upgrading (e.g. "Maceman 5 of London").

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the hidden attitude modifiers (possibly spoiler).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the hidden attitude modifiers (possibly spoiler).

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect maintenance costs ([ICON_GOLD]) and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the number of units you can draft this turn and whether the city has already drafted in the Draft button hover.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the number of units you can draft this turn and whether the city has already drafted in the Draft button hover.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows breakdowns for trade: total, foreign, and foreign overseas. Each includes those after it: foreign includes foreign overseas, and total includes both foreign and foreign overseas.

TEXT.English: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, shows the number of turns until the city will create the next great person ([ICON_GREATPEOPLE]).

TEXT.English: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, displays the buildings that will affect the [ICON_HEALTHY] and [ICON_UNHEALTHY] rates and by how much.

TEXT.English: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.
TEXT.Chinese: When checked, Workers ordered to chop a forest will stop with 1 turn remaining. Issue the order again to finish the chop.
